id.description: Unique identifier for the ActivityLogEntry record

date.description: Timestamp when the activity was recorded

userName.description: The name of the user who did the activity

userEmail.description: The email address of the user that did the activity

cycleId.description: The id of the cycle involved in the activity

cycleName.description: The name of the cycle involved in the activity

vendorId.description: The id of the vendor involved in the activity

vendorName.description: The name of the vendor involved in the activity

productId.description: The id of the product involved in the activity

productName.description: The name of the product involved in the activity

libraryId.description: The id of the library involved in the activity

libraryName.description: The name of the library involved in the activity

actionDescription.description: Text description of what the activity was

app.description: Which app the activity occurred in

category.description: General category of activity, for filtering on the list page

affectedEntityId.description: Track the couch ID of the entity that was modified

revision.description: The revision number of the entity before the activity modified it
